mapper.select: SELECT count(o.id) as count FROM cs_lease_returns o LEFT JOIN terminals t ON o.terminal_id = t.id WHERE o.customer_id = #{customer_id} ORDER BY o.created_at DESC

SELECT o.id, o.created_at, o.status, t.serial_num, o.apply_num, gb.`name` AS brand_name, g.model_number AS brand_number, pc.`name` as zhifu_pt, m.title AS merchant_name, m.phone AS mer_phone FROM cs_lease_returns o LEFT JOIN terminals t ON o.terminal_id = t.id LEFT JOIN goods g ON t.good_id = g.id LEFT JOIN good_brands gb ON g.good_brands_id = gb.id LEFT JOIN pay_channels pc ON t.pay_channel_id = pc.id LEFT JOIN merchants m ON t.merchant_id = m.id WHERE o.customer_id = #{customer_id} ORDER BY o.created_at DESC LIMIT #{offset},#{rows}

SELECT o.id, o.`status` AS apply_status, o.created_at AS apply_time, o.contact, o.phone, t.serial_num, o.apply_num, gb.`name` AS brand_name, g.model_number AS brand_number, pc.`name` AS zhifu_pt, m.title AS merchant_name, m.phone AS mer_phone, o.created_at AS one_time, od.updated_at AS two_time, g.lease_deposit, g.lease_time, g.return_time, o.cs_cencel_id, g.lease_price, cc.templete_info_xml, cra.address, cra.receiver, cra.phone AS receiver_phone,crf.`status` as crf_status,crf.return_price as crf_retrun_price FROM cs_lease_returns o LEFT JOIN terminals t ON o.terminal_id = t.id LEFT JOIN orders od ON t.order_id = od.id LEFT JOIN order_goods og ON og.order_id = od.id LEFT JOIN goods g ON og.good_id = g.id LEFT JOIN good_brands gb ON g.good_brands_id = gb.id LEFT JOIN pay_channels pc ON t.pay_channel_id = pc.id LEFT JOIN merchants m ON t.merchant_id = m.id LEFT JOIN cs_cancels cc ON o.cs_cencel_id = cc.id LEFT JOIN cs_receiver_addresses cra ON o.return_address_id = cra.id left JOIN cs_refunds crf on o.id = crf.target_id and crf.target_type=2 WHERE o.id = #{id} group by o.id
SELECT crm.content AS marks_content, crm.created_at, c.`name` AS marks_person FROM cs_lease_return_marks crm LEFT JOIN customers c ON crm.customer_id = c.id WHERE crm.cs_lease_return_id = #{id}
